page.title: 01STRACATHRO
page.content:
The area we have been studying consists mainly of{agricultural {land,with forestry and two rivers,the {West Water and the North Esk,}which flow together at the Meetings of the Waters in the centre of the land under study.
The agricultural land is divided up thus;{ground belonging to two large {farming and sporting estates,Careston {and Dalhousie, and to four private {owners,}one of those being{Tayside {Health Board.
Part of the Estates lands is farmed by themselves and part of it is farmed by tenant farmers.
The forested land is divided between the{Forestry Commission and {thetwo large estates}mentioned above.
